title: savvyinthekitchen
directions: In a deep saucepan, add butter to melt on medium heat.
Add in chopped onion, and cook until translucent, about 3 minutes.
Pour in chicken broth, and pumpkin purée.
Stir to combine, and add in evaporated milk.
Add in 1/4 cup of Parmesan cheese.
Add in salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Stir well, and let simmer while stirring occasionally for 10 minutes.
Serve hot, in bowls, and top with croutons and crumbled bacon.
ingredients: 4 slices of bacon, cooked, and crumbled into bits
